objects.description: [Maze](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0449) operators have used VirtualBox and a Windows 7 virtual machine to run the ransomware; the virtual machine's configuration file mapped the shared network drives of the target company, presumably so [Maze](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0449) can encrypt files on the shared drives as well as the local machine.(Citation: Sophos Maze VM September 2020)

external_references.description: Brandt, A., Mackenzie, P.. (2020, September 17). Maze Attackers Adopt Ragnar Locker Virtual Machine Technique. Retrieved October 9, 2020.
